lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Expiration Fridays, or triple witching hours, occur every three months when stock options, stock index options and futures on index options expire simultaneously.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A large number of MOC buy orders were not placed until after 1530 EST on Dec 19, which helped send the Dow Jones Industrial Average up 21 points in the final minutes of the day to a 14.20-point gain on the day, Ketchum said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Big Board has been collecting and publicizing information on large imbalances of "market-on-close" (MOC) orders placed on 50 major stocks one-half-hour before closing on so-called expiration Fridays in September and December.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Big Board has been collecting and publicizing information on large imbalances of "market-on-close" (MOC) orders placed on 50 major stocks one-half-hour before closing on so-called expiration Fridays in September and December.
